page.title: 03Employment Today
page.content: Out of the survey I did in my class I found out that 18 mothers and 22 fathers worked. Some of the mothers are housewives which accounts for more women unemployed than men. Many parents are employed at Glaxo and Cadburys Schweppes, nearby factories. Although the other jobs are varied, 8 of the parents are self-employed. 40 out of 54 parents work. 4 work at 3 nearby factories, 3 are teachers, 2 are secretaries, 2 cleaners, 2 joiners, 2 restraunt owners; there are 2 pub owners, 2 barmaids, 2 lorry-drivers, 1 is a garage worker, 1 docker, 1 farm worker, 1 childminder, 1 canteen lady, 1 electrician, 1 cashier, 1 milkman, 1 home help, 1 teaching auxiliary, 1 is a helper at a playgroup and art gallery, 1 potato merchant,1 dancing teacher, 1 printer and 1 member of the police force.
